message.content:
cs.CR, cs.HC, cs.SI, cs.CY, cs.DC 

The paper deals with access control mechanisms in smart home systems, which involves security and privacy concerns (cs.CR). It also focuses on user interaction and user needs, which falls under the category of human-computer interaction (cs.HC). The paper proposes a novel mechanism for access control, which involves backend servers and policy managers, indicating a focus on system architecture and design (cs.SI). The paper also mentions threats associated with access control mechanisms, which suggests a focus on cybersecurity (cs.CY). Finally, the paper deals with multi-user and multi-device scenarios, which involves distributed computing and networking (cs.DC).
